    • Constructor Detail

      • BasicRat

        public BasicRat(RatTypes type,
                Pos pos)
        1st Constuctor, intializes a basic rat in the Rat Class with it's type and position depending on the case.

        no side-effects

        referentially transparent

        Parameters:
        type - takes in the rat type of basic rat.
        pos - takes coordinates of the position of the rat.

      • BasicRat

        public BasicRat(RatTypes type,
                Pos pos,
                int hitPoints,
                int timeToGrowth,
                int numChildren,
                int moveSpeed,
                int timeToBirth,
                boolean canMate,
                boolean canMove)
        2nd Constuctor, for the save game file

        no side-effects

        referentially transparent

        Parameters:
        type: - save what kind of rat
        pos: - save position
        hitPoints: - save the health points
        timeToGrowth: - save time till growth if a baby
        numChildren: - save number of children if female
        moveSpeed: - save the movement speed
        timeToBirth: - save the set time that the female will give birth
        canMate: - save if able to mate
        canMove: - save if able to move
